title: Check Restaurant Health Inspection Results
description: A citizen wants to check the latest health inspection report for a specific restaurant.

tasks.description: Identify the restaurant the citizen is asking about.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the name and address of the restaurant.

tasks.description: Search the public database for the restaurant's inspection history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the inspection records for the restaurant.

tasks.description: Provide the date and results of the most recent inspection, including the score and any violations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the results of the last inspection.
